TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationIdentifier extends System.Object implements class System.IComparable

Docs.summary: Base class for types that identify control types, events, patterns, properties, and text attributes in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks The AutomationIdentifier class is effectively abstract, as it has no constructor and cannot be instantiated by applications.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to compare this one with.
Docs.returns: The hash code of this object minus the hash code of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: An object to compare with this identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method overrides the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

## Remarks ProgrammaticName is intended for debugging and diagnostic purposes only. The string is not localized.
This property should not be used in string comparisons. To determine if two properties are the same, compare the property identifiers directly.
## Examples The following example displays the programmatic name of each property supported by an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
